CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, May 9, 1964, pg. 16 reads: "Map Merchandising Program - Norman Powell, national sales manager, Special markets for Seagram's Distillers, and Bob French, area representative, discuss merchandising plans with Johnnie Johnson, Courier advertising director, in support of the current Seagram's 7 Crown campaign, during Mr. Powell's recent visit the The Courier."
TitMainTitle: Norman Powell, sales representative Robert "Bob" P. French Jr., and advertising director Johnnie Johnson, gathered at desk with a Seagram's 7 advertisement in background, Pittsburgh Courier office
